alert.note: Alert for Newton County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Newton County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut, or 18 miles southwest of Jasper, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Wayton... Mossville... Crossroad... Fallsville... Swain... Mt Judea... Deer... Dixon Ridge... Cowell... Nail... Arbaugh... Lurton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for western and north central Arkansas.
